name: Sift
body:
# sift

  Fast String Distance (SIFT) Algorithm.

## Installation

    $ component install timoxley/sift

## API

### sift(string, string)

  Return 'distance' between two strings.

## Credit

  Code extracted from [MailCheck](https://github.com/kicksend/mailcheck)

## License

  MIT
